text: Peter Ronald Clark (born 1933), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 3 miles at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:English male long-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Peter Clark (athlete)
